body:
The [docs](http://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html) give example usage of `spack mirror add` with mirror in the local filesystem (`file://`) and available through the `https` protocol. What is the full list of supported ways of getting the mirror?

Does it support ssh? rsync? http? 

How exactly should I configure the http(s) server to serve the Spack mirror? Do I need to use https://github.com/spack/spack.io ?

I know I can use sshfs, but not all workstation have it (and so far `sshfs` is not among the list of supported Spack modules)
title: What is the full list of supported transport protocols for `spack mirror add`? Does it support ssh?
